pages.text: If you enable the crafting guide generation feature (crafting.generate) in the configuration, the maid will automatically analyze nearby work blocks and read their corresponding recipes. $(br2)If you want your maid to do some block interaction crafting, like stripping, you will need to place an allow access on ground and keep it's around with enough space.

The maid currently supports reading recipes for Vanilla log stripping/Water collection/Crafting table/Smithing table/Stonecutter/Furnace/Brewing stand/TACZ workbench/Create mod: Packing, Item Application, Pressing, Mixing, Crushing, Milling, Splashing, Haunting, Smoking/TLM altar, AE2 Inscriber, Charger, World Interaction (excluding explosions); Botania Mystical Flower duplication, Apothecary, Runic Altar, Elf trading, White Daisy, Mana Infusion; Ars Nouveau Imbuement Chamber, Enchanting Apparatus, and enchanting recipes.
